headline: 3 Reasons to Sell AOS and 1 Stock to Buy Instead
summary: While the S&P 500 is up 13.6% since June 2025, A. O. Smith (currently trading at $68.05 per share) has lagged behind, posting a return of 7.9%. This was partly driven by its softer quarterly results and may have investors wondering how to approach the situation.
